data.title: // ABOUT HACK THE BREACH
paragraphs: Hack The Breach is the premier cybersecurity workshop and hackathon for security professionals, ethical hackers, and technology enthusiasts. Join us for fifteen intensive days of hands-on workshops, expert talks, and capture-the-flag challenges.
Our mission: to foster innovation in cybersecurity, build community among security professionals, and develop the next generation of ethical hackers.

features.title: Workshops
features.description: Hands-on technical training on exploitation techniques, defense strategies, and emerging threats

features.title: Expert Talks
features.description: Security thought leaders sharing insights on the latest attack vectors and protection methodologies

features.title: CTF Competition
features.description: 24-hour hackathon with goodies and prizes for teams that demonstrate exceptional exploitation skills

features.title: Networking
features.description: Connect with industry professionals, researchers, and fellow security enthusiasts

data.title: # Perfect for:
attendees: Computer science students with security interests
UG, PG and PhD Students looking to learn about cybersecurity
Industry professionals in the field of cybersecurity
Faculties in the field of cybersecurity
Researchers in the field of cybersecurity
Beginners who want to learn about cybersecurity
